entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Thursday 28 April 2016
